title: גיק ג'וב: אוסף משרות היי-טק חמות במיוחד - 25 בנובמבר
description: גם השבוע אספנו עבורכם את המשרות החמות ביותר בהיי-טק הישראלי, על-מנת לעזור לחברינו שמחפשים משרה חדשה. בין משרות השבוע: UI Designer, מומחה שיווק אונליין, Software Architect for New Innovation Team ועוד
articleBody:
גם השבוע אספנו עבורכם את המשרות החמות ביותר בהיי-טק הישראלי, על-מנת לעזור לחברינו שמחפשים משרה חדשה. בין משרות השבוע: UI Designer, מומחה שיווק אונליין, Software Architect for New Innovation Team ועוד

אחת המטרות לשמן ייסדנו את גיקטיים היתה לקדם את קהילת ההייטק בארץ. בפוסט הגיקג’וב השבועי, אנחנו מפרסמים חלק מהמשרות המפורסמות בלוח משרות ההייטק החדש של גיקטיים. אם אתם מעוניינים למצוא משרות נוספות או לפרסם משרות שלכם, אתם מוזמנים לעשות זאת באמצעות לוח המשרות החדש שלנו – Geeklist. שתפו את הפוסט והעבירו הלאה כדי לעזור לחברות להפיץ את המשרות ולגולשי גיקטיים למצוא את העבודה החדשה שהם מחפשים.
לחברת ביטוח מובילה באיזור המרכז דרוש/ה בודק/ת תוכנה WEB לתפקיד מעניין כחלק מצוות בדיקות תוכנה.
דרישות:
ניסיון של שנה – שנתיים בביצוע בדיקות תוכנה ידניות וכתיבת תסריטים תוך יישום מתודולוגיית בדיקות.
ניסיון בבדיקות client-server – חובה.
ניסיון בבדיקות WEB – חובה.
ידע וניסיון בעבודה מול DB – חובה.
ניסיון בבדיקת אפליקציות mobile – יתרון משמעותי.
ידע בתחום הביטוח – יתרון משמעותי.
לשליחת קורות חיים למשרת בודק/ת תוכנה WEB

חברה מובילה בתחומה מגייסת אקדמאים מצטיינים בלימודי מדעים מדוייקים למסלול ייחודי.
מדובר בהכשרה ועבודה בתפקידי פיתוח תוכנה בחברות גדולות, מוכרות ומבוססות ברחבי הארץ.
דרישות:
תואר ראשון או שני במדעים מדויקים, מדעי המחשב וכד’.
פסיכומטרי בציון 700 ומעלה והצטיינות בתקופת הלימודים.
נכונות מלאה להכשרה אינטנסיבית במשך כ-25 שבועות.
כושר למידה עצמית, מוסר עבודה גבוה ותקשורת בין אישית.
לשליחת קורות חיים למשרת אקדמאים מצטיינים
Are you a passionate UI Designer?
Have you ever dreamt to work in one of the world’s leading gaming companies?
To leave your mark? To make a difference?
Playtika is the place for you.
Together we will create the most epic kick-ass entertainment experience ever!
Create a playful, intuitive cohesive look & feel, and overall user experience for our products.
Responsible for designing and implementing challenging and dynamic interfaces for web and mobile environments.
Conceptualize, present and execute ideas within a tight schedule technical.
Requirements:
At least 2 years of experience in UI design.
Deep understanding of UX principals.
Excellent knowledge of Photoshop and Flash and After Effects.
Knowledge in 3D Max/Maya/illustrator – advantage.
Experience developing for multi-platform user interface – advantage.
Gaming background – advantage.
*** PLEASE ATTACH PORTFOLIO (sorry, but we will contact only resumes with portfolio links).
To send a CV for the position of UI Designer

dapulse is a successful new tool for managing teams and entire companies. Released about a year and a half ago, dapulse shows an amazing growth with customers like Uber, Blizzard, Wix, Fiverr, Outbrain, WeWork and 1700 others.
What you’ll be doing:
Manage high budget and large scale Facebook and Google PPC
campaigns.
Analyze and optimize campaigns constantly to maximize revenue.
Initiate and implement improvements and creative solutions to increase campaigns activity.
Requirements:
2+ years of online marketing experience.
Proven track record of effectively managing large advertising budgets generating high-volume of quality leads media buying.
Hands-on experience with Google AdWords / Facebook Ads is a must.
Ability to optimise all aspects of a PPC campaign: keyword research, bid management, ad copywriting, landing pages, conversion funnel.
Experience with multi-country web marketing efforts.
To send a CV for the position of Online Marketing Expert

A well-established company in the field of networking is seeking for a Software Architect.
To join a new innovation team. To seek and implement new technologies, lead the development cycle in several state of the art innovations and to be the subject matter expert for the development teams within the company.
This is a great opportunity to join a new innovation team seeking and implementing state of the art technologies in the field of networking.
Requirements:
Bsc in computer science from a leading academic institute.
5+ years server side development experience.
Experience in software architecture – a must.
Solid programming skills in Java,Python.
Experience in web application/virtualization – a must.
Experience in networking – big advantage.
Proven oop experience – a must.
Linux experience – a must.
Hands-on person,new technologies seeker,very independent.
To send a CV for the position of Software Architect for New Innovation Team
As the primary support person, you will be responsible for analyzing, investigating and working with R&D to resolve customer issues. You will work hands on with databases (MySQL, RedShift, Couchbase, Elastic), Amazon AWS, and other leading technologies.
As the first engineer on the new support team, you will be able to influence on the work procedures, tools and vision of the team.
Requirements:
Experience working with SQL – Must.
High attention to detail, with ability and passion to troubleshoot complex problems.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills (English and Hebrew).
Able to work independently and make decisions. Demonstrated ability managing priorities in a fast-paced environment.
A strong sense of empathy with customers.
At least 3-4 years experience in a similar role in a SaaS or web company, working on critical production environments.
To send a CV for the position of Tier 2 Support Engineer

DevOps engineer that will join a team that creates & maintains critical web services for the company.
Requirements:
At least 3 years of experience in a dynamic language (Ruby, PHP, Perl, JS).
DBA experience (MySQL, PostgreSQL, CouchDB, Memcache, Redis).
Linux sysadmin experience.
Understanding of protocols and software stacks used with web development.
Experience working with high-traffic, scalable systems (in public or hybrid clouds is a plus).
Working knowledge of source control tools (git is a plus).
Ability to research, learn and implement new technologies in short time.
Ability to work independently and as a part of a team.
To send a CV for the position of DevOps Engineer

Join the new Microsoft Health team in Israel, and help us make a difference in people’s lives. Come and make real world impact by building innovative technology that will empower consumers to take a proactive and preventative approach to their health, fitness and wellness, using biometric data from wearable devices, rich user understanding, and diverse world knowledge.
Technology evolution and market trends create a unique opportunity to help our users manage their health and wellness in a highly personalized manner. Microsoft Health aims to provide disruptive capabilities in this space. The new Microsoft Health team in Israel will focus on driving innovative personalized health and wellness scenarios and experiences in Cortana and beyond, and powering those scenarios with advanced personal analytics based on machine learning models and diverse algorithmic approaches.
We are looking for Senior Software Engineers, with strong technical leadership. The ideal candidate would be an experienced developer with background in delivering services and experiences at scale, experienced with complicated landscapes, familiar with big data and machine learning, experienced with creating algorithms that leverage diverse data, proficient in C# or similar and a quick learner.
Requirements:
B.Sc. in Computer Science or equivalent.
5+ years of software development experience using C#, Java or similar language.
Strong technical abilities, problem solving, design, coding and debugging skills.
Experience in developing, shipping and operation of cloud services is a significant advantage.
Experience in Machine Learning and algorithm development is a significant advantage.
Strong communication skills and track record of successful cross-group collaboration.
Independent, quick learner, capable of making decision in an ambiguous environment.
Enthusiastic and team player.
To send a CV for the position of Sr. Software Engineer- Microsoft Health ILDC

Do you love solving problems and help others? Do you want to work with customers who are changing the way software development is done? Join the BlazeMeter Customer Support Team.
Responsibilities:
Help customers solve technical problems.
Reproduce customer issues.
Develop samples demonstrating JMeter testing in the Source cloud.
Collaborate internally with development and sales teams.
Requirements:
Good understanding of computer basics such as:
Computer Networking ;Operating Systems (Redhat/Debian/osx) ;Scripting languages (Java, Ruby, JS, Python) – advantage.
Service orientation.
Giving proper customer support while keeping the Company’s interests.
Responsible, self-directed and highly adaptive to changing priorities.
Troubleshooting skills.
Debugging scripts/product .
Writing basic scripts.
Strong Analytical capabilities.
Working hours : Monday- Thursday 10:00 – 19:00 , Sunday & Friday 10:00-15:00.
Coming from the field of Testing/QA/DevOps/Ops – advantage.
Technical knowledge in performance testing – advantage.
English Speaker.
To send a CV for the position of Support Engineer
